models.name: OpenAI GPT-4o mini
models.description: An affordable, smaller model optimized for fast, lightweight tasks. While it may not match the depth of larger models, it provides efficient performance for simpler applications.

models.name: OpenAI o1-mini
models.description: Offers a 128,000-token context window, optimized for quick reasoning and complex analytical tasks, ensuring rapid and accurate responses.

models.name: OpenAI o3-mini
models.description: A model with an extended context window (up to 200,000 tokens), designed for fast and complex reasoning tasks, providing efficient performance.

models.name: OpenAI GPT-4o
models.description: A high-intelligence model suitable for complex tasks, including both text and vision inputs, with a 128k context length. It balances performance with cost, making it versatile for various applications.

models.name: OpenAI o1-preview
models.description: Designed for complex reasoning tasks, o1-preview spends more time 'thinking' before responding, making it effective in science, coding, and math applications.

models.name: OpenAI o1
models.description: An advanced reasoning model that builds upon o1-preview, offering enhanced capabilities in complex problem-solving across various domains.

models.name: OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo
models.description: An optimized version of GPT-4 with a larger context window (up to 128,000 tokens), ideal for processing long-form content and extensive document analysis efficiently.

models.name: OpenAI GPT-4
models.description: OpenAI's advanced language model, known for its high accuracy and complex reasoning capabilities. Suitable for tasks requiring deep understanding and nuanced text generation.
